official_title: A concurrent resolution requesting a report from the Securities and Exchange Commission on acquisition of United States firms by foreign nationals.

summary.text: Requests the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Secretary of Commerce each to report to Congress on the impact on the U.S. economy and securities markets of the acquisition of U.S. companies by foreign nationals. Declares that such reports should include an assessment of the necessity, desirability, and likelihood of entering into agreements with other countries.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution requesting a report from the Securities and Exchange Commission on acquisition of United States firms by foreign nationals.
